bilingual.source: An mfe is highly regarded in the finance industry.
bilingual.target: 硕士金融工程在金融行业中备受推崇。

bilingual.source: He is an ace in the world of finance.
She has a great interest in finance.
bilingual.target: 她对金融有很大的兴趣。
金融市场每天都在变化。

bilingual.source: She has a strong interest in finance.
bilingual.target: 她对金融学有浓厚的兴趣。
我们需要更多的金融知识。

bilingual.source: The finance crisis affected the global economy.
bilingual.target: 金融危机影响了全球经济。

bilingual.source: Finance helps us understand how markets operate.
bilingual.target: 金融学帮助我们理解市场运作。

list.abstract: finance（英 [ˈfaɪnæns]，美 [ˈfaɪnæns]），英语单词，作名词为财政；金融；财务状况。作动词为“为…提供资金”。短语搭配有finance company，international finance，high finance。例句：Taxpayers should only finance the most gifted students.（纳税人应该只资助最有天赋的学生。） 近义词有policy of tightening control over expenditure and credit，cameralistics，fund raising。

yingyinNormal.en: You overstep your office my Minister of Finance. Our Lord battles the coward's poison.
yingyinNormal.zh: 您越界了，财政大臣，我们的大汗正在和小人下的毒抗争。

yingyinNormal.en: So does she. Her family owns Dunbar Armored Cars. She could finance her entire campaign if she needed to.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她也有钱，她家族拥有邓巴装甲车公司，有必要的话，她能负担得起全部竞选费用。

yingyinNormal.en: As many of you know, recently Massimo Corteleoni has agreed to finance the expansion of the James Holt label transforming the work of this visionary artist into a global brand, which is really an exciting enterprise.
yingyinNormal.zh: 正如大部分人所知最近马西莫·科特利让内决定为詹姆斯·浩特这个品牌注资，将这位富于创造灵感的艺术家的作品转变成一个全球品牌，一个振奋人心的产业。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 经济上；财政上；金融上
adj. 财政的；金融的；有钱的；已缴费的

word_family.mean: n. 财政；金融；财务状况；财源；资金；岁入

examination_example.sentence: California plans to treat 35, 000 acres of forest a year by 2020 – <highlight>financed</highlight> from the proceeds of the state's emissions-permit auctions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 加州计划到2020年每年处理35，000英亩森林，资金来自该州排放许可证拍卖的收益。

examination_example.sentence: Congress should look into doing so directly, by helping to <highlight>finance</highlight> PreCheck enrollment or to cut costs in other ways.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是国会应该直接深入调查此事，可以资助预检登记或者以其他方式降低花费。

sense_info_list.en: the branch of economics that studies the management of money and other assets

examination_example.sentence: For someone moving from <highlight>finance</highlight> to advertising, maybe they want to look more "SoHo."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于从金融转向广告的人来说，也许他们想看起来更像“自由职业者”。

sense_info_list.en: the monetary resources and affairs of a country, organization, or person
the management of large amounts of money, especially by governments or large companies

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 名词后缀, 性质, 状况

word_usage.usage: finance作名词，表示“财力，财源，财务管理”时，常用的复数形式，如：personal finances
finance作动词时，为及物动词，其后可接名词或者代词，如：finance this organization 资助这个组织。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 经济上；财政上；金融上
adj. 财政的；金融的；有钱的；已缴费的

word_family.mean: n. 财政；金融；财务状况；财源；资金；岁入

sense_info_list.en: the monetary resources and affairs of a country, organization, or person

examination_example.sentence: Build up her own <highlight>finances</highlight> step by step.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一步一步建立自己的财务。

examination_example.sentence: I have no other choice but to build up my own <highlight>finances</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我别无选择，只能建立自己的财务。

examination_example.sentence: The cathedral has been at the centre of a years-long dispute over who should <highlight>finance</highlight> restoration work of the collapsing staircases.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这座大教堂一直处于一场长达数年的争论的中心，争论的焦点是谁应该为倒塌楼梯的修复工作提供资金。

examination_example.sentence: Taxpayers should only <highlight>finance</highlight> the most gifted students.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 纳税人应该只资助最有天赋的学生。

sense_info_list.en: the management of large amounts of money, especially by governments or large companies

examination_example.sentence: A bill approved by the Senate <highlight>Finance</highlight> Committee would implement or test many reforms.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 参议院财政委员会批准的一项法案将实施或测试许多改革。

examination_example.sentence: The Senate <highlight>Finance</highlight> bill would impose an excise tax (消费税) on health insurance plans that cost more than $8,000 for an individual.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 参议院财政法案将征收消费税个人花费超过8000美元的健康保险计划。

sense_info_list.en: the branch of economics that studies the management of money and other assets

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

examination_example.sentence: Understandably, there are concerns about what this means for public <highlight>finances</highlight> given the associated health and pension challenges.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 鉴于相关的医疗和养老金方面的挑战，人们担心这种趋势会对公共财政造成影响，这是可以理解的。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 名词后缀, 性质, 状况

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 经济上；财政上；金融上
adj. 财政的；金融的；有钱的；已缴费的

word_family.mean: n. 财政；金融；财务状况；财源；资金；岁入

sense_info_list.en: the monetary resources and affairs of a country, organization, or person

examination_example.sentence: Furthermore, studies show that <highlight>finances</highlight> are the most frequent subject of communication between parents and their college children.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 此外，研究表明，财务问题是父母和大学生子女之间最常交流的话题。

examination_example.sentence: Travel: You must arrange and <highlight>finance</highlight> your travel to and from the location where you will do your internship.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 旅行：你必须安排并资助你往返实习地点的旅行。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 表示"结束, 范围, 界限, 限制"(=end, boundar)
